original_text: The captains did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded, and they each brought his men who were to go off duty on the Sabbath, with those who were to come on duty on the Sabbath, and came to Jehoiada the priest.
korean_text: 백부장들이 이에 제사장 여호야다의 모든 명령대로 행하여 각기 관할하는 바 안식일에 들어오는 자와 안식일에 나가는 자를 거느리고 제사장 여호야다에게 나아오매

sentences.original_text: The captains did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 대장들은 제사장 여호야다가 명령한 모든 것대로 행하고

sentences.original_text: they each brought his men who were to go off duty on the Sabbath
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 안식일에 근무를 마칠 사람들을 데리고

sentences.original_text: with those who were to come on duty on the Sabbath
and came to Jehoiada the priest.
